publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5443 Christine Grahame: Post Office Development and Diversification—That the Parliament, recognising the key role of Scotland’s post office network in both urban and rural communities, commends the Post Office Diversification Fund, which helps post offices improve and diversify during the recession and was introduced by the Welsh Assembly Government, and recommends that the Scottish Government examines introducing a similar scheme.

S3M-5443 *#* Christine Grahame: Post Office Development and Diversification—That the Parliament, recognising the key role of Scotland’s post office network in both urban and rural communities *such as the Scottish Borders*, commends the Post Office Diversification Fund, which helps post offices improve and diversify during the recession and was introduced by the Welsh Assembly Government, and *considers that similar support should be provided to the post office network in Scotland*. Supported by: Kenneth Gibson*, Patrick Harvie*, Alasdair Allan*, John Lamont*, Robin Harper*, Maureen Watt*, Bill Kidd* Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S3M-5443# Post Office Development and Diversification (lodged on 22 December 2009) Angela Constance*
S3M-5443# Post Office Development and Diversification (lodged on 22 December 2009) Gil Paterson*, Willie Coffey*

S3M-5443# Christine Grahame: Post Office Development and Diversification—That the Parliament, recognising the key role of Scotland’s post office network in both urban and rural communities such as the Scottish Borders, commends the Post Office Diversification Fund, which helps post offices improve and diversify during the recession and was introduced by the Welsh Assembly Government, and considers that similar support should be provided to the post office network in Scotland. Supported by: Kenneth Gibson, Patrick Harvie, Alasdair Allan, John Lamont, Robin Harper, Maureen Watt, Bill Kidd, Angela Constance, Gil Paterson, Willie Coffey Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S3M-5443# Post Office Development and Diversification (lodged on 22 December 2009) Joe FitzPatrick*
